articles.author: Ian Duncan, Lori Aratani
articles.title: Flight delays and cancellations: Sen. Maria Cantwell questions airline CEOs - The Washington Post
articles.description: The chairwoman of the Senate committee that oversees the aviation industry sent letters to chief executives at Allegiant, American, Delta, JetBlue, Southwest and Republic, questioning their management of schedules and workers.
articles.content: I am concerned that, at best, these airlines poorly managed ... marketing of flights and workforce as more people are traveling, and, at worst, they failed to meet the intent of tax payer funding and… [+7178 chars]

articles.author: Emily Anthes, Alexandra E. Petri
articles.title: As the Delta variant fuels rising U.S. cases, the C.D.C. director warns of a ‘pandemic of the unvaccinated.’ - The New York Times
articles.description: Cases, hospitalizations and deaths remain far below last winter’s peak and vaccines are effective against Delta. But rising cases prompted the official, Dr. Rochelle P. Walensky, to again plead with Americans to get fully vaccinated.
articles.content:
